sentence: christmas day is one of the most favorite american holidays .
putting up christmas trees, giving gifts .
and sending greeting cards have become traditions even for many .
also a tradition to place a decorated christmas tree in the white house .
the official home in washington d.c. of the president .
the presidentâ€™s grandchildren young benjamin and mary mckee, led the harrison household into the second floor oval room .
to take a look at the first white house christmas tree .
it was lit with candles. filled stockings hung from the mantel .
presents, candy and nuts were distributed to family and staff. president harrison gave turkeys and gloves .
he received a silver-dollar-shaped picture holder .
